scripts.update: lerna run build --include-dependencies && yarn workspace @scrowl/editor run copy:assets
scripts.serve:web:dev: docker-compose --file containers/web.docker-compose.yml --env-file ./dev.env up --build -V && docker-compose logs -f -t server
scripts.seed:web:dev: docker exec containers-authoring-editor-server-1 yarn workspace @scrowl/editor run seed:web
scripts.stop:web:dev: docker-compose --file containers/web.docker-compose.yml --env-file ./dev.env down && docker-compose --file containers/web.docker-compose.yml --env-file ./dev.env rm
